hopobject.name: BuildBeagle
hopobject.body: Project to develop a concise but complete rootfs for testing purpose based on Qt 4.5, X11, SDL and DirectFB. Based on Buildroot we shall make a rootfs optimized for OMAP35x to run on the NAND FLASH or SD card.
hopobject.shortdesc: Project to develop a concise but complete rootfs for testing purpose based on Qt 4.5, X11, SDL and DirectFB. Based on Buildroot we shall make a rootfs optimized for OMAP35x to run on the NAND FLASH or SD card.
